chunks.chunk_text: The genesis of the termremains a topic of debatebut it gained prominencewhen a 22-year-oldBritish TikTokerSabrina Bassoonfearlessly danced in the London subwayproudly declaring herself a delulu girlyThe term's subsequent viral spreadinspired individualsworldwideto embrace unabashed behaviourencouraging them to defy societal normsand stop caring about others' opinions
